## Final Project Milestone 3

# Trying consumer shopping dataset 
(https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/iamsouravbanerjee/customer-shopping-trends-dataset)
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
shopping <- read.csv("shopping_trends_updated.csv")
```
```{r}
shopping |>
  group_by(Size) |>
  summarize(mean(Purchase.Amount..USD.), sd(Purchase.Amount..USD.), var(Purchase.Amount..USD.))
```

```{r}
shopping |>
  group_by(Season, Gender) |>
  summarize(mean_purchase = mean(Purchase.Amount..USD.))
```

```{r}
shopping <- shopping |>
  mutate(Rating.Bracket = case_when(
    Review.Rating < 1 ~ "Under 1 Star",
    Review.Rating >= 1 & Review.Rating < 2 ~ "1 Star",
    Review.Rating >= 2 & Review.Rating < 3 ~ "2 Stars",
    Review.Rating >= 3 & Review.Rating < 4 ~ "3 Stars",
    Review.Rating >= 4 ~ "4+ Stars"
  ))
```
